title: Grab EA Sports College Football 25 For Only $41 At Amazon Before It's Gone
description: EA Sports College Football 25 $43 for PS5, $41 for Xbox (was $70) See at Amazon Madden NFL 25 $45 for Xbox, $48 for PS5 (was $70) See at Amazon Big Deal Days is over, but substantial discounts on two of the biggest games of 2024 are still available. Football fans who haven't picked up EA Sports College Football 25 and Madden NFL 2025 for low prices at Amazon. PS5 and Xbox Series X versions of both football sims are eligible for the deals. College Football 25 is on sale for up to 40% off, while Madden has up to a 35% discount. We can't imagine these deals will stick around for much longer, so snag them while you can. EA Sports College Football 25 $43 for PS5, $41 for Xbox (was $70) EA Sports College Football 25 is discounted to $41 for Xbox Series X and $43 for PS5, both of which are all-time lows. It's the first licensed college football game since NCAA 14, which released in 2013. The decade-long hiatus led to College Football 25 being perhaps the most anticipated sports sim of all time in the US.As with all sports sims, there are certainly areas of the experience that could benefit from improvements, but EA Sports College Football 25 is a lot of fun. It's sure to be on many holiday wishlists this year, so Amazon's deal offers a great opportunity to save close to $30. See at Amazon Madden NFL 25 $45 for Xbox, $48 for PS5 (was $70) Madden NFL 25 is available for $48 for PS5 and $45 for Xbox. The Xbox disc grants access to both the Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S versions of the latest Madden game. Amazon is sold out of the PS4 version, so you need to own a PlayStation 5 to take advantage of this deal. html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Big Deal Days is over, but substantial discounts on two of the biggest games of 2024 are still available. Football fans who haven't picked up EA Sports College Football 25 and Madden NFL 2025 for low prices at Amazon. PS5 and Xbox Series X versions of both football sims are eligible for the deals. College Football 25 is on sale for up to 40% off, while Madden has up to a 35% discount. We can't imagine these deals will stick around for much longer, so snag them while you can.

EA Sports College Football 25

$43 for PS5, $41 for Xbox (was $70)

EA Sports College Football 25 is discounted to $41 for Xbox Series X and $43 for PS5, both of which are all-time lows. It's the first licensed college football game since NCAA 14, which released in 2013. The decade-long hiatus led to College Football 25 being perhaps the most anticipated sports sim of all time in the US.

As with all sports sims, there are certainly areas of the experience that could benefit from improvements, but EA Sports College Football 25 is a lot of fun. It's sure to be on many holiday wishlists this year, so Amazon's deal offers a great opportunity to save close to $30.

Madden NFL 25

$45 for Xbox, $48 for PS5 (was $70)

Madden NFL 25 is available for $48 for PS5 and $45 for Xbox. The Xbox disc grants access to both the Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S versions of the latest Madden game. Amazon is sold out of the PS4 version, so you need to own a PlayStation 5 to take advantage of this deal.
